name: CirClash
description:
This is a small local multiplayer game developed for two players, so you'll need obviously two controllers to play, right ?

Minigames:

  • Hotpotato - You really should not have the hot potato at the end
  • Shooting - This is self explanatory.... if not --  "give it a shot !"
  • Colors - Stand on the correctly colored block
  • Dodge - Dodge the obstacles
  • ShootingV2 - Shooting with a twist
  • Sumo - Throw your opponent off the platform

Developer comments:

  • The Web version might not work as well as the desktop version, so the desktop version is recommended.
  • If you have found a bug, please write it in the comments section of the page.
    Your help is highly appreciated.

Resources:

  • Textures by https://cc0textures.com
